meanings.definition: The state or quality of being gooey.
meanings.sent1: The gooeynesses of the marshmallows made them perfect for toasting over the campfire.
meanings.sent2: I love the gooeynesses of melted cheese on pizza.
meanings.sent3: The gooeynesses of the slime made it impossible to put down.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had a gooeynesses that warmed everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The gooeynesses of the chocolate cake was irresistible.

meanings.definition: The gooey texture or consistency of something.
meanings.sent1: The gooeynesses of the caramel oozed out of the candy bar.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't resist the gooeynesses of the freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent3: The gooeynesses of the glue made it tricky to stick the pieces together.
meanings.sent4: The gooeynesses of the mud clung to her shoes as she walked through the swamp.
meanings.sent5: The gooeynesses of the honey made it hard to pour.
